name: Upwards, Lonely Robot
description: Simple to play but difficult to master, Upwards, Lonely Robot combines addictive ‘one more go’ gameplay with quirky and endearing art direction and an intriguingly cryptic story to bring you a gaming experience unlike any other.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP2 or newer Processor: 2GHz Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10.1 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM

reviews.review_text: I like this game... repeatedly a challenge to reach the top :) You can be addicted
